feed.title: Immich Power Tools Releases

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.1.8 - Docker Fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: disabled nextjs image optimization due to sharp dependencies by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/16

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/compare/v.0.1.7...v0.1.8

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.1.9 - ENV Fixes
entry.content:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/compare/v0.1.8...v0.1.9

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.2.1

ðŸš€ Immich Power Tools 0.2.1

Bug Fixes

  • asset filter condition revert (3be8938)
  • support videos (58f6435)

What's Changed

  • fix: minor ux improvements and video player support by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/23

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

What's Changed

  • fix: minor ux improvements and video player support by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/23

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/compare/v0.1.9...v0.2.1

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add External Immich URL Redirection via Environment Variable by @sai80082 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/25
  • Feat: Find and tag assets with missing locations by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/28
  • fix: removed thubmnail and preview paths by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/30

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3.1
